description:
Get a peak inside Ekoda-chan`s psychology with director Takahashi Ryosuke (Young Black Jack, Gasaraki) and Mimori Suzuko (Ultraman Geed, Revue Starlight).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Takahashi Ryousuke x Mimori Suzuko
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 6 - Takahashi Ryosuke x Mimori Suzuko
